Even in 2021 this game rocks!, cant believe it took me so long to get around to playing!

Can I just get a cake that's actually real please? Like, it's been years Glados, come on.
本人亲身经历，吃撑了，缓一缓，别多喝水。喝多了，更撑了，走一走，千万别坐下玩这个。在宿舍里想吐又吐不出来太难受了
This game is the reason I earned a third brain cell. Thanks Valve!

Es ist schon ein Klassiker der Puzzel-games! Ich habe es viel auf Playstation schon gezockt! Und ich muss sagen ... es ist ein Werk der Liebe, des Nachdenkens und des Kuchen! 

Das Spiel versteht sich schnell und leicht, es ist eine enorme Empfehlung für Jeden!!!!!
me gusta el pastel de chocolate
очень крутая игра, всё было практически легко, но конец поразил меня сложностью.
Eat the pussy with aggression YEE YEE YEE

musch yeessssss. i would say that this game is a mastapiece if it was a bit longer. Its like an hour and a half, which is sad. the stuff towards the end is pretty cool with the story stuff and all that. also glados looks terrible in this one. but it is really good and i cannot say that enough. if you havent played this, there is something wrong with your head. play now

9/10
Минус 1 балл за то, что нельзя отсосать самому себе
One of the best games out there it makes so much fun to play all test chambers :)

Buenisimo, los puzzles no son estupidamente complicados ni tampoco demasiado fáciles, pero lo mas interesante es que cuando sales de la primera zona el juego hace un giro completo, lo que lo vuelve mas complicado, a la vez que tienes que usar todas las mecánicas que has aprendido. Aunque dura poco mas de 3 horas se pasan volando y nunca te aburres.
OMG! this is a must play, not the best in replay ability. But has some really fun challenges, HIGHLY recomend, well worth the money

Uhm, well. I beat the campaign in 2 hours. Was it worth it---yes, with the sale. I loved the polished puzzle game feel and the undertones of something more sinister that become deeper and deeper then even more apparent till the end. I loved the gritty dark feel to it and the puzzles where fun, easy enough, and very satisfying to glide through (they felt a bit, too easy? Maybe just me). But I am sure the challenges is something more for me to get into for something more of a grind. Overall, loved the mysterious story and the robot Glados and her humor and personality---she added a lot to the feel of the game. Overall, short, sweet, and fun. 10/10.

Una experiencia tan sólida como atemporal que con su simpleza y su duración de tan solo un par de horas fue un ejemplo de gran diseño de niveles y eficacia, a demás de encantar con su personalidad y sutil humor.

Halfway through playing Portal 2, I did a quick search to see if I should play Portal 1 before I went on. Really glad I took the time to play portal 1 first. 

It's a super quick play-through, I mean I finished it in 3 hours but I've been told I'm quite the gamer extraordinaire. Game holds up and is definitely worth the play, if you can happen to find it on sale.
太棒了，很难相信是2007年的游戏，游戏性设计真得非常牛逼！！！
Very dark humor, very funny, very puzzle. Very Enjoy.
Una historía inolvidable para los veteranos de steam
good games или же 1 часовой коридорный гладос

The main story isn't that long and hasn't that much test chambers, but all of them are entertaining and even tho I never played a portal title before, I ended up understanding and controlling how portals work. You also have the option to play advanced levels, challenges, or imported levels in case you finish the game but want to continue solving puzzles. I loved the game.
La historia principal se completa muy rápido, pero tiene niveles extra que son mas difíciles
perfect just perfect never asking for a refund

So, I've just bought this game again on my current account. The last time I've played it was about 10 years ago. The nostalgia creating goosebumps from deep within reminded me why I love the Portal games so much. Playing in this eerie abandoned laboratory, solving partially deadly puzzles with a gun that brought in a revolutionary style of puzzle solving, is awesome. Even after ten years. 

I recommend this game to everybody who likes first person puzzle games and others who are looking for a different experience.
Es un juegazo, lamentablemente antes no lo podía jugar pero gracias a las ofertas de invierno de 2021 por fin lo probé y solo puedo decir que es uno de mis juegos favoritos.
Прекрасная игра, интересные головоломки и путешествие по порталам. Это все про эту игру
One of the best antagonists ever! A very funny game with good practice for the brains.
игра быстрая, можно пройти сюжет за 3-4 часа. Однако эмоций она подарит не мерено

要吐了...好...暈.......暈啊啊啊啊!!!!!
啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊吐吐吐了......
Classic Valve game, will keep you busy for a couple of hours. Puzzles are not that hard
Хорошая игруха скоротает 2-3 часа жизни, 2 лучше

Portal is absolutely still a great game that I wished people acknowledged as much as its younger brother. In my opinion it's just as fun, puzzling and gratifying as Portal 2, if lacking that game's sense of humour, Portal IS funny, but it's comedy is spaced out a little more which will ever be a good thing or a bad thing depending on how well the jokes land, personally I prefer Portal 2's approach. It's a great game even today, it holds up great as is standard for Valve games. Don't let Portal 2 get all the love.

Игра  почти без сюжетная, но я рекомендую её за новаторство. Проходится за 2 часа + где-то 4 часа доп испытания на золотые метали [strike] гори в аду тот кто придумал испытания на кол-во шагов. [/strike]
pretty good game, nothing else to say
wtf are these impossible ass challenges
очень крутая игра люблю разные головоломки и это одна из самых крутых советую!
非常に面白くてぶっ続けでクリアしました
Жаль, что короткая. Определённо рекомендую к прохождению.
Игра суперская! Вот на самом деле не люблю разгадывать головоломки ,но эта игра меня просто поразила хоть и 2007 года.
